citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written and documented contingency plan. The contingency plan allows for facility staff to
knowledgably and appropriately respond to emergencies to ensure the continued well-being of the animals during an
emergency. The contingency plan must identify situations that may trigger the need for a response to an emergency,
outline specific tasks required to be carried out in response to the emergency, identify a chain of command, and address
how response and recovery to the emergency will be handled. Correct by ensuring that a contingency plan is developed,
documented, and followed to ensure for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of animals in
the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct by: June 4, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
